title: Amazing(a few cons tho)
text: Ok so i‚Äôve been a muser since 2016, and at first with the Tik Tok update i wasn‚Äôt happy at all. I thought i would hate it and a bunch of worse things would have happen. After time i began to love it so much i have over 1k and i have a little issues but i‚Äôm fine with this not being fixed ‚Äúas soon as possibly‚Äù. So one of the problems are the for you page, once and blue moon you‚Äôll get on it, (unless your super lucky) and i would work so hard for it and never get on it, i came to think of it as in just not quality video enough for it and that‚Äôs alright! Another thing is i like to find random small accounts and like atleast 30 of their videos good or bad, but i can‚Äôt do it as often now we have a ‚Äúlimit‚Äù on likes and comments (which i think is really dumb). I have one last issue and that is that videos are being deleted for no reason!!! i had a really popular one of mine deleted and it made me super upset even tho it didn‚Äôt have anything wrong with it. Same for live streams innocent people get suspended because a 9 year old reported them. Thank you for taking the time to read this! I would love it if you could atleast fix one of these problems!!

title: Important and fun.
text:
It slaps. But do you really need my advice?  Is anyone even reading this?  Stop.  Stop reading it.  STOP I SAID.  Whatever.  Keep reading then. I could do this all day. Taping away on my phone, wasting time we both could be spending enjoying TikTok. Wait is it TicTok or TikTok? Did you look?  Are you sure you‚Äôre not reading some review of a knock off app? Nevermind, it‚Äôs TikTok. Pretty sure.

If you‚Äôre still reading this congrats.  Only 2.1% of readers make it this far. And believe me, there is much much more to come.  Up next...actually there isn‚Äôt. This has been fun, for both of us, but it‚Äôs getting ridiculous, right? I mean, what is the point of this? Why, oh Lord, why? Why won‚Äôt he stop? And by ‚Äòhe‚Äô I mean me. Ok, that‚Äôs it. I‚Äôm calling it.  Once you start referring to yourself in the third person, it‚Äôs time to...do some other thing, or something.  I don‚Äôt know.  I never said I was good at reviews. Oh, right.  The review.  TikTok is good.  How‚Äôs that?  Believable?  It is true too.

I guess there was a lot more after all. Sorry about that.  In conclusion, if you read this far, maybe TikTok isn‚Äôt for you after all.  Instead, make some human friends.  Peace.

title: Adult nudity not even being taken down?!
text: I love tiktok, Ive been using it for a very long time. I‚Äôve always noticed if there is any type of nudity or inappropriate content, it gets taken down immediately -however recently I have seen some disgusting things, such as a mans lower body part, a women who‚Äôs completely naked on a slideshow, and there‚Äôs even a trend where women take their shirts off and flash the camera. I‚Äôve reported every one of these videos, yet I get a notice saying the guidelines had not been broken. what? I just looked down at my phone in complete disgust. I see so many videos about how tiktok doesn‚Äôt even take nudity down anymore, and I wholeheartedly agree. TikTok was a fun, safe app for kids and teens and now it‚Äôs like a porn site. It is insane that I‚Äôve reported at least 10 videos with clear adult porn in them, whether it‚Äôs a women‚Äôs chest or a man‚Äôs penis. It‚Äôs EXTREMELY wrong and gross for tiktok to take down a 15 year old girl swimming with her friends but not grown women flashing the camera. There are kids on this app, and if they want to do that then TikTok is not the place-and although the change needs to be with them too, it needs to start with the Tiktok team and whoever is in charge of the guidelines, because they‚Äôve clearly given up

title: Well it‚Äôs good but bad at the same time
text: The first time you get this app, you think it‚Äôs really cool and very fun. You may think it‚Äôs an app for kids but... this app can get you in a LOT of trouble. The reason why I say that is because you have to think before you talk or do anything . If you DONT people will cancel you and send you death threats.  And you won‚Äôt even have any time to apologize. On TikTok there is a group of careless teenage boys called ‚ÄúThe Boys‚Äù and they cyber bully EVERYONE that is a poc/minority, lgbtq, or have a disability. If they see that you are one of them they will send you messages that are very harming. Not only that but this app can be very addicting you start to forget about your school work, friends, and even your family. You talk less with the people you love and know and person, because you‚Äôre always obsessed with your videos getting 100+ likes and trying to not get yourself shadow banned. Also I think TikTok should remove the videos for being our pfp because they are the main ones to not get taken down unless you have a lot of people reporting it. This app should not be for kids that are 12 or younger, because they be involved in cp or any other dangerous activities. I don‚Äôt think this is a good app, and I would be more than happy if this app were to be taken down.

title: Story mode
text: This app is a very entertaining and amazingly functional app. TikTok has a very addictive function that allows you to scroll and even add things of your liking based on what you like, aren‚Äôt interested in, and more! You can add videos to your favorites and even make collections out of them. You can see the history of comments you‚Äôve made and videos you‚Äôve seen. My only problem is that one of my favorite and recent features has been removed from my TikTok. This month TikTok added this recording feature which many call ‚Äústory mode‚Äù. Many users have commented on this feature on how much they love it and appreciate TikTok adding this feature! However, more recent to this, TikTok has removed this feature for many users. Including me. When recording videos to post or even just for myself I like features and filters that make me look flattering. Story mode had a specific camera function and cropping that changed the way it looked when recording. Simply cropping it isn‚Äôt the same as already recording with it. I‚Äôm hoping that you‚Äôll bring it back or reply to me with a solution to this, but I thought it‚Äôd be best to bring this to your attention.

title: The moderation is just not there
text: The app is wonderful! I get to see so much content that I love! But you know what I don't love? The moderation. The system is either too harsh or not harsh enough, in just the past two days I've reported 7 different things that VERY MUCH violate the guidelines, and once it has been "reviewed" it was shown to have apparently not violated the guidelines. There is too much that the dev team lets the community get away with, and I understand that staff shouldn't be subjected to troubling and disturbing content but it reaches a certain point that there isn't any other choice than to have staff review reports. Not taking action against this issue is what enables people to continue violating your guidelines and until action is taken, people won't stop. To be able to make your platform a safe place, you need to hold your community accountable when it is actively hurting itself, and until you make it known that you're going to be taking action, people will continue abusing the lost reporting system. Unfortunately I don't expect a response, or even one that REALLY acknowledges what I said at all besides, " We understand your concern and will take it into consideration." Consideration isn't an option anymore, it needs to be done NOW.

title: Downlad this app!!

So I do have one complaint and that is that tiktok does take up a little more space on my phone then I want but then again TikTok can‚Äôt be perfect. There is something called a ‚ÄúFor You‚Äù spot on the top of your screen people might talk about it a lot they might comment on a video saying something like ‚ÄúFYP!!‚Äù They are referring to the For You page. If you open the app it will most likely take you to the FYP, on the for you page there is stuff that tiktok thinks you would like to see.( such as funny videos or art videos) if you double tap your screen on a video then that‚Äôs how you can like a video, to follow them you can click the plus under their pfp ( profile picture) then you can go to the ‚ÄúFollowing‚Äù page at the top and there you can see the content that the people you post. Like almost all apps you have to make an account I can‚Äôt help you sign in but I can tell you that TikTok is a fantastic app so please consider downloading it. Yes I know this was long but thank you for going to read my review.

title: My experience on the app TikTok so far.
text: It‚Äôs really really fun I use it everyday but some videos can tend to be a little weird so don‚Äôt be surprised. Let me walk you through the basics about TikTok if you like a video double tap to like it and you can add it to your favorites too by clicking the bottom underneath the comment section which is the speech bubble. The comment section is that you and others that saw the same video can comment on it you can like others comments and you can also follow content creators by clicking the red plus underneath their profile pictures. You can also go to their page my swiping left. You can share the video too to some friends by clicking the arrow at the bottom and choosing what person you want to send the video to! You can also make videos people can like, comment, or follow you as well! That‚Äôs all I‚Äôm gonna tell you you‚Äôll find the rest on your own. Oh, and one last thing you can search people in TikTok including your friends or others just click the little magnifying glass at the top right of your screen. These are all the basics have fun and enjoy TikTok!

title: Literally only two complaint from me
text:
Okay so i have only two major problems with this app and that first being that when i have to log out, to keep people from snooping in my phone and getting into my stuff, all my drafts get deleted. Like some im saving for a day when i can‚Äôt do anything but i still want to give my content to my fans but i log back in and its all gone. So then i have to get back into those cosplays and redo them. While yes, this gives me a chance to fix any mistakes in the previous cosplays i had, i still want to be able to go back later and see the progress i have made. So can you keep the drafts there just maybe put them under a security thing? So that if you have to lock them in case you get hacked or my situation happens nothing will happen to the drafts? 
My other problem is that you guys have a set up for notifications from what users we want to see. So i enable the notifications on a few of them but i never get notifications despite seeing their content later. I set up notifs on my gf so i can support her and gets others to support her to but anytime she uploads, i never get a notif. Its usually us chatting later that she asks if ive seen her new tik toks and i am just like shook. 
So basically please fix the drafts situation and the notifications please?

title: Musically
text: I love musically it‚Äôs such a fun app and many ways to express your personality. I love all the filters and the effects for them. But there are some things I would like to bring up and bring back. First, I don‚Äôt duet a lot of people especially when there strangers, but I can‚Äôt seem to duet with my friends without them tagging me and it‚Äôs really annoying because it also does that with my friend to. Second, the privates thing is annoying and u can‚Äôt put a video in your privates anymore if I want to duet it. Third, I did some spooky musicallys with the new effects, but they took off this really cool one where everything‚Äôs black but it outlines everything and I think that was a really good effect and I was sad when they got rid of it. And lastly, this one isn‚Äôt really a big of a deal but Ive started doing redos from my first musicallys but it‚Äôs so annoying trying to get back all the way down to the bottom of your account, if u could plz add something to make this easier that would be amazing. But like I said musically is a very fun app and I recommend it 100 percent. Thanks if you read all of this even if your the creator of this app, I‚Äôm very happy with this app and I would be disappointed if it got deleted from the App Store.üòÅ‚ù§Ô∏èüòÇüëç

title: okay
text: It‚Äôs pretty good. The videos are funny and all but if I like one single video my whole fyp turns into stuff about that video and it‚Äôs sooo annoying. I also hate the stupid reposted movie clips. The app is constantly getting unnecessary updates, like changing where buttons are and stuff like that. Also, I wish (like with your watch history) you could have a select all button and delete all your comment history. (You have to manually go to each video and delete it. Another thing is if I search up something, for example, once I searched up a pin/button maker because I was interested in buying one. The first 2 maybe 3 videos were about a pin/button maker, but the rest were completely random and literally had nothing to do with what I searched. Then it brings me to a page that says ‚Äúothers recently searched‚Äù and then the options are, ex: ‚Äúbutton maker green‚Äù or ‚Äúbutton maker how to use‚Äù and there‚Äôs no point because even if I click on one of those, again, it shows me three videos related to the topic then shows me the most random videos. This is not how it worked before. If I searched something up I only saw things related to my search. Praying this stops happening because it is SOOO ANNOYING.

title: For parents
text:
For all of the parents who think that they shouldn't let their kids have TikTok. You may think "there is inappropriate things on there" TikTok's that are inappropriate get taken down because TikTok's moderating system is pretty good. "but what if old men or people I don't want following my kid follows them?" you can block people on TikTok or just make the account private so only certain people can follow you!! "how will I know what kind of stuff my child is watching?!" you can login to their account on your device so you can see what they watch. "what if someone comments something mean"
You can turn comments off. My parents used to think this exact same way, the way I convinced them to let me have TikTok was that they would login to my account from my device and see what I do and say. I recommend TikTok to everyone because it can easily inspire you and the fyp is customized to what you watch or what you like. you can see what your friends are doing and if you get enough followers then you can even make money from videos. anyways, thats all I had to say... please take what I said into consideration!

title: TikTok is great, but...
text:
So, I‚Äôm a cosplayer and we‚Äôre a fairly big community on TikTok. The problem is, TikTok shadowbans us. Our content is not shown to the world, causing our hard work and efforts to go down the drain. I have to constantly keep making new accounts so people can see my content. You shouldn‚Äôt shadowban people for using the same tags over again multiple times. It makes it clear what its from, what character, what the video‚Äôs about, etc. 
I‚Äôve had to take down videos and reupload because you shadowban my account and nothing is shown to anyone. Even after reuploading, it never seems to get anywhere either. 
I spend SO much money for this and you trash it like it‚Äôs nothing. Its cruel how you do this. As much as I may hate the app for this, I still remain on it because of how happy it can make me sometimes. It gets hard to enjoy it when all you do is shadowban and delete my content. It‚Äôs unfair and disgusting. 
At least let us KNOW before you go ahead and block all of our content. Like, give us cosplayers a warning, and then we‚Äôll start using different tags, or calming down on our posts a little. We aren‚Äôt spamming the hashtag or making inappropriate tiktoks, we‚Äôre making our cosplays known. It‚Äôs insanely difficult to do that because of this, and it angers me, as well as many others, a lot. Fix your app, it‚Äôs horrible.

title: IF YOU ARE A PARENT PLEASE READ (2nd paragraph)

title: Great Social Media App but....
text: Hi love this app so much as a content creator. It is fun, it‚Äôs easy, and the communities you create are fantastic. Also I love that there is gifting within the app. The is a but however.... There seems to be issues with TT‚Äôs reporting process. For example, I had a video reported and taken down because it ‚Äúviolated‚Äù TT‚Äôs guidelines. I‚Äôve read their guidelines twice and it does not. It also seems that you can report someone for any reason, and even if it is not true, that person can lose their ‚Äúgo live‚Äù privileges, or even a temporary ban. There should be an appeal process with TT admins and someone to speak to regarding these issues. Also, while some accounts are getting banned or having features temporarily turned off for no apparent reason, there are bully accounts growing a rapid rates. These accounts depict hate towards veterans, the disabled, age, race, religion, sexual orientation, gender, etc. it breaks my heart every time I run into these accounts and see how they mistreat the helpless. SHAME on TikTok for not having a better system to address this. I really hope I can come back and give 5 stars in the future. But for now I‚Äôm at 3.

title: The Best App Since Vine
text: I absolutely love it. There‚Äôs nothing that could ever compare. It‚Äôs hilarious and political and overall just...works. The ‚ÄúFor You‚Äù page is tailored to what you like and who you follow. The algorithm works beautifully. I honestly have no words it‚Äôs such a great app. The only time i‚Äôve ever seen it glitch was like, a week ago? And that‚Äôs pretty good, considering I‚Äôve had the app for over two years now. It keeps all of your notifications, even if you log out if your account, so you‚Äôre always protected. Honestly, even if it was stealing my information and running even when i shut the app out, I don‚Äôt care. I open my phone with my finger print. Now, most people open their phones with their faces too. Who cares?? Our information was being stolen by the government in the first place üòπüôà‚ú® Anyways, i really enjoy the app, 10/10, I‚Äôll use it until it shuts down. I‚Äôve learned more on this app than I have throughout my entire US education....and I‚Äôm a sophomore in high school. This app shares information and trends and jokes faster than Ive ever seen and I love it with my whole chest. Thank you TikTok and please never leave ü•∫‚ù§Ô∏è

title: The problems with Tik Tok
text: Tik Tok obviously is not a platform for children to be browsing on, so I don't understand what the problem is with a little bit of adult humor. There are way too many people who get offended by little things. For example, I made a video simply following a trend of doing a certain dance aggressively. Out of nowhere, a ton of people started hating in the comments for "being rude to the creator of the dance" by doing it aggressively. Then in a week or two, the video was "under review" and still has been under review for 4 weeks now. Tik Tok rarely ever responds to reports and also shadowbans way too many good content creators. These content creators are probably the reason a lot of people still use the app, so why shadowban them? They're just helping you expand your platform to multiple types of audiences. Also, the views system must be addressed. I have over 20,000 followers and a lot of my videos maintain a very high like-to-view ratio, yet they don't receive nearly as many views as one would expect that it should get. For smaller accounts, this continues to be an issue. Less views means less exposure, which thus means less followers. Tik Tok also seems to tend to give my less successful videos way too many likes, which have a horrible like:view percentage. These views should instead go to the content that people like more.

title: Don‚Äôt take away TikTok!!!
text:
I, like many others, have learned so much from this app that I hadn‚Äôt even though of, considered or even have a crap about until I downloaded this app and saw random videos on here. I love this app for so many reasons, the connections made, the lives changed so drastically by people WANTING to do good deeds, the pets saved, probably several cases solved, the LEARNING that happens because of people sharing things to teach others, I mean there is literally something for everyone here. I have seen many, many others praise this app for the same reasons, because the things you learn here can vary from a new recipe to hacks, to things about your mental and physical health, things about history, things about your government and places around the world, things about your pets, other people, other cultures‚Ä¶ so of COURSE the government wants to interfere, because it‚Äôs something they can‚Äôt make money off of or control or it‚Äôs something they didn‚Äôt think of first. 
Don‚Äôt let this app become another sad memory like MySpace. This app does so much GOOD in the world and it makes no sense to be negative about it all.

title: SCAMS GALORE
text:
So many of the sponsored ads are SCAMS. They‚Äôre dropshippers! Especially the Sanrio ones. Every single one of their products can be found on AliExpress! Want to how you can find out? Take a screenshot and reverse image search one AliExpress. I‚Äôve seen water bottles, sun lamps, lighters, hello kitty phones, counterfeit Sanrio products CONSTANTLY being pushed through the sponsored ads. Idk how tiktok processes their applicants for ads, but this is super ridiculous. I don‚Äôt even know if anything is done with the reports I make because I‚Äôm not foolish enough to fall for the scams, and because they don‚Äôt give updates on the ads you report. If Tiktok doesn‚Äôt come up with a better way to handle this, I can see the company in very deep trouble in the long run.

As a woman that really doesn‚Äôt want to interact with stupid children, it‚Äôs a step in the right direction to add an adults only feature. What really needs work on is the false reporting that happens that salty people make. Not that it‚Äôs happened to me, but I know people who have truly been falsely reported for ‚Äúminor safety‚Äù and ‚Äúthis is a minor.‚Äù Really, you make a video that doesn‚Äôt agree with a certain group of people, and it‚Äôs like a flock of angry Karens get unleashed on you. Come up with a better way to review reports (other than bots) because that‚Äôs what I feel really hinders anyone‚Äôs (who isn‚Äôt a kid) experience with tiktok.

title: It‚Äôs a good app for entertainment but it is a breeding ground for misinformation and controversy
text: TikTok is a very good app for both advertising, entertainment, and etc but it can sometimes stir up controversy that sometimes go as far as death threats and cancel culture sure most of the targets deserve punishment but it shouldn‚Äôt go that far. For example a situation involving TikToker ‚ÄúOnlyJayus‚Äù (which I will not go in detail about) got her mass back lash and if I am correct even her IP address was leaked. Second thing misinformation is a pretty big problem on TikTok in my opinion sure you have large creators spreading researched facts and information but then you have thousands of smaller ones that spread things that are simply ludicrous and not true but it wouldn‚Äôt be a problem if most of or at least a good portion of TikTok actually believes it (mostly kids rarely teens). But to be frank there are simply many other problems on TikTok that I can‚Äôt simply cover but overall they‚Äôre not much of a problem but show their heads once and a while but overall it‚Äôs a good app I‚Äôd recommend it if you want to be entertained or start a career in entertainment just try not to get in to hot water or fall for misinformation.

title: Good App Just Some Major Issues
text: Tiktok is a great platform to grow and show your content to the world but there are a few things causing creators to stop using the platform that need to be fixed immediately. I am a creator with over 1.8M followers and I have been posting for over a year now. A issue is whenever I try to report a problem or ask any questions with my account I never get any responses from Tiktok or anyone. I believe it I‚Äôm a creator with that large of a following Tiktok should at-least reply to my questions. Another issue is the community guidelines and the Ai or bots used to suppress or shadow an your account and take down your videos. I have videos get taken down by TikTok‚Äôs robots and they should never have been taken down in the first place. Also Tiktok has been not allowing me and other users to pin comments. The pinned comments i pin are invisible to other accounts and the whole reason for a pinned comment is so other users can see them at the top of a comment section. I believe Tiktok has the potential to stay and be the best social media platform or any device. We as Tiktok creators just need some more support from the platform since it seems like Tiktok is trying to hurt creators for doing what they love.

title: Unclear Account Suspension...
text:
My account was recently permanently banned. After going through the guidelines, nothing I posted violated community guidelines. Worse yet, the app is supposed to have an ‚Äúappeal‚Äù option and it wouldn‚Äôt show up. Contacted customer support through the only way I could find in both the app and one the website, and I still have no clear explanation as to why my account was PERMANENTLY banned and no clear way to appeal their decision. I‚Äôm incredibly disappointed because I really enjoyed TikTok and made sure my videos fell within guidelines. I posted a ‚ÄúHappy Memorial Day‚Äù video with some planes flying over from an air show, and within hours my account was taken down. Previously I posted videos of my die cast car collection, and am completely unsure how any of those would land me in ‚Äúpermanently banned‚Äù mode.

Don‚Äôt put too much effort into your account if you have one...the app developers can clearly take away all your hard work in an instant for no clear reason. If there had been a reason for the ban, I wouldn‚Äôt be leaving this review, but since I didn‚Äôt violate any guidelines to my best knowledge (and I have reviewed the guidelines to make sure), and was given no explanation, I am making sure I share my story with friends and whoever will listen so they don‚Äôt have to feel the same way I did after all my work was gone.

title: Why we should have what ever number followers to go live
text: I love this app so much and the thing about it is you‚Äôre get to post whatever you want and people like share follow and comment really positive things but really what I don‚Äôt understand is that Tik tok does not let you go live until you have 1000 followers and I don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs right to people who don‚Äôt have 1000 followers and have worked their way up I feel like it doesn‚Äôt matter how many followers you have on this app as long as you are building a community and friendship with this app then everybody‚Äôs good to go and everybody can go live whenever they want to The reason why I‚Äôm saying this is because I once had an account that almost went up to 1000 followers and before I had almost  1000 followers my account got deleted and now I have to restart everything this is the reason why it doesn‚Äôt matter if we have 1000 followers or not we should be able to go live whenever we want to because I really wanted to work my way up and get 1000 followers if you do this Tik tok the world means everything to the people who don‚Äôt have 1000 followers or likes
